email.title: DoCSoc Summer BBQ
email.text:
Hi everyone,
Hope your summer holidays are going well! With the great weather, DoCSoc will be holding a summer barbecue in a couple weeks' time. If you're around then, take a look at the event details below!

event.text:
Working or staying in London over the summer? Come on down to the DoCSoc summer BBQ for free food, drinks and laughs.
It will be held in Prince's Gardens from 1-5pm. Please click **Going** on the Facebook event if you plan on coming so we have enough food for everyone!
While there will be lots of food, if you would like to bring some extra food or drinks, that would also be most welcome!
Note: you must be a member of DoCSoc to attend this event. Computing, JMC, and EIE students are automatically DoCSoc members.
